title: 恋はバイブコーディング

beats.text: ポットの音に耳をすませば

beats.text: 君の気配が　遠くなる

beats.text: 空の色がやけにブルーで

beats.text: 時計の針は　迷子のまま

beats.imagePrompt: A still intersection under blue traffic lights, no cars or people, eerie quiet

beats.text: 僕はなぜか　立ち止まる

beats.text: 決まりごとじゃ　届かない

beats.text: 手探りで君に触れた午後
beats.imagePrompt: Two hands reaching for each other through rippling light, golden hour in a park

beats.imagePrompt: A glowing red heart hovering over an old analog radio, faint signal waves around it

beats.text: 駅のホーム　誰かのため息
beats.imagePrompt: A nearly empty train platform at twilight, a person sitting alone with visible breath in the cold air

beats.text: 風に乗って　過去になる
beats.imagePrompt: Old photographs flying into the wind over a field, fading into light as they fly away

beats.text: 言い訳より　正解よりも
beats.imagePrompt: A chalkboard with half-erased equations, sunlight filtering through classroom windows

beats.text: 沈黙が　うまく話す夜
beats.imagePrompt: A nighttime scene on a hill, a quiet pair sitting in silence, watching the city lights below

beats.text: 紙の地図をたたんでしまい
beats.imagePrompt: An old paper map being folded slowly on a stone bench, autumn leaves around

beats.text: GPSも切ったままで

beats.text: 行き先も　理屈も捨てて
beats.imagePrompt: A person walking barefoot on a misty forest path, no signs, only nature

beats.text: ただ君の声　呼んでいた
beats.imagePrompt: A forest at dusk with a faint glowing echo of a voice in the wind, subtle sound waves in the air

beats.text: 恋はバイブコーディング
beats.imagePrompt: A repeating visual of glowing lines of code turning into flower petals, drifting through the air

beats.text: 揺らぐ感情のコード
beats.imagePrompt: Colorful neural network patterns pulsing gently like emotions, superimposed over a human silhouette

beats.text: 解析不能な　微熱のようで
beats.imagePrompt: A thermometer fogged up in a hand, ambient soft light, sense of uncertain warmth

beats.text: 夢のなかで君が笑う
beats.imagePrompt: A dreamy meadow under twilight with a ghostly figure fading into the light

beats.text: ログも取れずに　消えていく
